alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Cleveland; Ouachita (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 8:43PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bradley, south central Cleveland, northern Calhoun and east central Ouachita Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 843 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Highland Industrial Park, or 8 miles northwest of Hampton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hampton... Highland Industrial Park... Ellisville... Weeks... Tipton... Hampton Municipal Airport... East Camden... Banks... Tinsman... Delhi... Chambersville... Locust Bayou... Woodberry... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern and southwestern Arkansas.
